issue.title: [Java] remove equals API from ValueVector
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6210](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6210). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is a follow-up from <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4933>

The callers should be fixed to use the RangeEquals API instead.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6210?focusedCommentId=16904979) by Ji Liu (tianchen92):*
Thanks for opening this, I'll take it.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6210?focusedCommentId=16907503) by Bryan Cutler (bryanc):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5065
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5065>
